<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprofutil">sampleprofutil</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if the given callsite is hot wrt to hot cutoff threshold.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Functions that were inlined in the original binary will be represented</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in the inline stack in the sample profile. If the profile shows that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the original inline decision was &quot;good&quot; (i.e., the callsite is executed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// frequently), then we will recreate the inline decision and apply the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// profile from the inlined callsite.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To decide whether an inlined callsite is hot, we compare the callsite</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sample count with the hot cutoff computed by ProfileSummaryInfo, it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// regarded as hot if the count is above the cutoff value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When ProfileAccurateForSymsInList is enabled and profile symbol list</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is present, functions in the profile symbol list but without profile will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be regarded as cold and much less inlining will happen in CGSCC inlining</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pass, so we tend to lower the hot criteria here to allow more early</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inlining to happen for warm callsites and it is helpful for performance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprofutil/#ab6789a9522443425d339fa34c25f89d5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprofutil/#ab6789a9522443425d339fa34c25f89d5">callsiteIsHot</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;CallsiteFS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo">ProfileSummaryInfo</a> &#42;PSI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ProfAccForSymsInList) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CallsiteFS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The callsite was not inlined in the original binary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PSI &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;PSI is expected to be non null&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t CallsiteTotalSamples = CallsiteFS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples/#adb2786061d3e569b42b7d661ccc57484">getTotalSamples</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ProfAccForSymsInList)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !PSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo/#a5f58eb949321536363605ac9920a95cb">isColdCount</a>(CallsiteTotalSamples);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo/#ac46d4d55dd867977ba88d57a170e31de">isHotCount</a>(CallsiteTotalSamples);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Mark as used the sample record for the given function samples at</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (LineOffset, Discriminator).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns true if this is the first time we mark the given record.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofutil/samplecoveragetracker/#adb303c9c849d1db014aac9dc66d344c8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofutil/samplecoveragetracker/#adb303c9c849d1db014aac9dc66d344c8">SampleCoverageTracker::markSamplesUsed</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;FS,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            uint64&#95;t Samples) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sampleprof/linelocation">LineLocation</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>(LineOffset, Discriminator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = SampleCoverage&#91;FS&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstTime = (++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> == 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstTime)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalUsedSamples += Samples;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstTime;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the number of sample records that were applied from this profile.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This count does not include records from cold inlined callsites.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofutil/samplecoveragetracker/#a3dd722b8bbc4b043fd9a360f68aead04"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofutil/samplecoveragetracker/#a3dd722b8bbc4b043fd9a360f68aead04">SampleCoverageTracker::countUsedRecords</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;FS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/profilesummaryinfo">ProfileSummaryInfo</a> &#42;PSI)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = SampleCoverage.find(FS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The size of the coverage map for FS represents the number of records</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that were marked used at least once.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != SampleCoverage.end()) ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;second.size() : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are inlined callsites in this function, count the samples found</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the respective bodies. However, do not bother counting callees with 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// total samples, these are callees that were never invoked at runtime.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : FS-&gt;getCallsiteSamples())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprofutil/#ab6789a9522443425d339fa34c25f89d5">callsiteIsHot</a>(CalleeSamples, PSI, ProfAccForSymsInList))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the fraction of sample records used in this profile.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The returned value is an unsigned integer in the range 0-100 indicating</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofutil/samplecoveragetracker/#a794d2f372a7bc1e5f5f90bd2bc5ca8d3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofutil/samplecoveragetracker/#a794d2f372a7bc1e5f5f90bd2bc5ca8d3">SampleCoverageTracker::computeCoverage</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Used,</Highlight></CodeLine>
